metadata.title: CVE-2021-25786 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in QPDF version 10.0.4, allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code via crafted .pdf file to Pl_ASCII85Decoder::writeparameter in libqpdf.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-25786` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqpdf26 - 9.1.1-1ubuntu0.1
qpdf - 9.1.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qpdf package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.1.1-1ubuntu0.1').
